title: Somerville 1 year lease, starts 9/1 or before
posting_body: ['Price now $4,900.', "One of Somerville's most beautiful condominiums.", 'One-year lease begins as early as 8/15 on this eight room, over 1,900 square foot space.', 'Dog of any size OK.', 'Central air!', " A WalkScore Biker's Paradise.", 'So much room - especially for your work from home lifestyle.', 'Down the hill to Union Square and the T. Pristine home with deck, shaded backyard and parking.', 'Walk through the slider to entertain friends on your private deck, with the garden just a few steps away.', 'First floor bedroom with en-suite bath.', 'Half bath on the first floor as well.', 'A beautiful stairway leads to the bedrooms, bath, and washer/dryer downstairs.', 'Room for a home office on the lower level.', 'Modern, ample closets throughout, plus a kitchen pantry closet.', 'Light maple flooring throughout.', 'One garage, and one driveway parking space is yours.', 'Home will be delivered empty, and awaits your style imprint.', 'Snow and yard maintenance are included.']
